dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President-elect Joe Biden plans to nominate former Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen to become the next Treasury Secretary, the Wall Street Journal first reported Monday.

dialogue_turns.text: Well, apparently, they agreed to a shared vision, Host_A. To completely dismantle the American economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, apparently, they agreed to a shared vision, Host_A. To completely dismantle the American economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If she is nominated and confirmed, Yellen will be faced with the task of stabilizing an American economy that is reeling from the effects of the coronavirus pandemic amid ongoing gridlock over stimulus legislation in Washington.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dismantle the economy? The economy that was supposedly, uh, already being dismantled by everyone but Trump? What are you even talking about?

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fifty percent inflation? You think Yellen, a former Fed chair, is going to, uh, deliberately crash the economy? That's just... I mean, seriously?
